name: Smashed (Rebourtino's Productions)
description:
Misako is late for the club party.

Find a way to contact her and smash your way trought the streets.


Note:

  • If you encounter any bug please contact me and i will make sure to fix it as soon as possible.
  • Current version : v1.3
  • This is my first game

Requirement

  • You will need to use a controller to play this game.
